attributes.action: Introduce a TAX rate of 70% on earnings over £150,000.00 per anum until austerity ends
attributes.additional_details:
The world is facing economic meltdown.

Governments everywhere have to commit Treasury money to stabalise the banks and markets.

The workers of the world face decades of austerity.

It is, therefore, only right that those among us with more money should contribute more to save the world economy.

Anyone earning more than £150,000.00 per anum should be required to pay 70% TAX on earnings above £150,000.00 per anum until the world economic crisis is over.
